name: SHMediaItem
desc: An object that represents the metadata for a reference signature.

items.name: init(properties: [SHMediaItemProperty : Any])
items.desc: Creates a media item object with a dictionary of properties and their associated values.

items.name: subscript(SHMediaItemProperty) -> Any
items.desc: Accesses the property for the specified key for reading.

items.name: struct SHMediaItemProperty
items.desc: Constants for the media item property names.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: A title for the media item.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: A subtitle for the media item.

items.name: var artist: String?
items.desc: The name of the artist for the media item, such as the performer of a song.

items.name: var artworkURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL for artwork for the media item, such as an album cover.

items.name: var videoURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL for a video for the media item, such as a music video.

items.name: var genres: [String]
items.desc: An array of genre names for the media item.

items.name: var explicitContent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the media item contains explicit content.

items.name: var isrc: String?
items.desc: The International Standard Recording Code (ISRC) for the media item.

items.name: var songs: [Song]
items.desc: An array of MusicKit song objects that represent the song.

items.name: var appleMusicURL: URL?
items.desc: A link to the Apple Music page that contains the full information for the song.

items.name: var appleMusicID: String?
items.desc: The Apple Music ID for the song.

items.name: var webURL: URL?
items.desc: A link to the Shazam Music catalog page that contains the full information for the song.

items.name: var shazamID: String?
items.desc: The Shazam ID for the song.

items.name: class func fetch(shazamID: String, completionHandler: (SHMediaItem?, Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Requests the media item for the song with the specified Shazam ID.
